title: Design Ops at Accurat
description: Supports the work of a 30+ multidisciplinary team with human-centered thinking processes. Turns repetitive tasks and organizational dysfunctions into opportunities and learnings. Guides project units with novel design approaches that result in cross-team contaminations.
imagealt: Accurat installation for the exhibition Broken Nature at the Triennale Design Museum

title: Firefox for Echo Show
description: Designed the first-ever voice-controlled Firefox Browser for 2 smart displays used by 800K+ users.
imagealt: Homescreen screenshot of Firefox for Echo Show

title: Firefox for Fire TV
description: Reshaped an elementary TV web browser–originally developed in a 5-day sprint–into a native remote-controlled TV app serving up to 8 million users.
imagealt: Homescreen screenshot of Firefox for Fire TV

title: Firefox Design System
description: Joined the Firefox Quantum task force that shipped the new Firefox in November 2017. Audited, tested and documented the new Photon UI language in a design system that set the basis for future Firefox versions.   Organized and supported programs bringing design and engineering closer together.
imagealt: Homepage screenshoot of the Firefox Design System website

title: Visiting Professor
description: Developed the first 60-hour course on Web and Media Design at the MA in Eco-Social Design. Assisted and mentored a group of students during the development of their main semester project.
imagealt: Picture of the Free University of Bozen-Bolzano campus

title: A List Apart
description: Co-authored an article about the importance of animation in product design, and how motion creates opportunities to make our interfaces better at every level.
imagealt: Picture of the Free University of Bozen-Bolzano campus

title: Unibz Design System
description: Designed and co-developed the university website built on a custom WYSIWYG editor where faculty staff can autonomously compose and publish web pages for a total of 5 schools, 49 curricula and counting.
imagealt: Picture of the Free University of Bozen-Bolzano campus

title: Studio Mut
description: Co-designed and developed the website for "one of the most vibrant graphic design studios in Italy" Grafik Magazine – London.
imagealt: Picture of the Free University of Bozen-Bolzano campus

title: Tronko
description: There’s no better algorithm than the suggestions from your own peers. Tronko is an app for movies and TV shows recommendations from the one source you trust – your friends.
